name: Failtris (Kai Eckert)
description:
What happens, if the goal of Tetris would be to reach to the top of the grid? And can we make this a little harder? :-)

Failtris starts very simple, but gets much harder at the end. Beat level 10 to win the game.

The mechanics have an inner logic, where shapes with missing tiles are still shapes that can only fall down together (not like candy crush). There is also no chain reaction (again not like candy crush). Therefore higher columns than currently allowed and tiles in the air can exist and are not bugs, but certainly a different mechanics might be even more fun (like candy crush ;-)).

Submission for the Wowie Jam 3.0.
